name: Pumpkin Plunderers
description:
-Overview-

Protect your pumpkins from evil ghosts who try to possess them, using your trusty pitchfork! Earn points over time based on the number of pumpkins you have remaining. Defeating ghosts also earns you points.

-Game jam-

Pumpkin Plunderers was made for the "Mini Jam 89: Pumpkin" gamejam. The jam's theme was pumpkin. Also included in the jam was a limitation that the game must use a myth or legend. I used the classic horror myth of ghosts for my entry.

-Credits-

Color palette is "SPOOK-12" by Ivigrr

Main font is "Hydrating Lip" by Hazel Abbiati

Title font is "Doomed" by Bubble Tea?
